recordTypes.name: Temporary Storage Units
recordTypes.description:
TSU = Temporary Storage Unit

A. Definition: "Temporary Storage Unit" means any container used for the storage of personal property that is typically rented to owners or occupants of real property, but may be owned by such, for their temporary use and which customarily is delivered and removed by truck.

recordTypes.description: Please complete this application for the Town of Middletown's Burn Permit.

recordTypes.name: Pay As You Throw: User Fee (trash & recycling)
recordTypes.description: $185 user fee, billing cycle is Nov 1 through Oct 31, user fee reduced on May 1 to $95.

recordTypes.name: Middletown Resident: Beach Seasonal Parking Pass Application
recordTypes.description: All passes purchased online will be available for pick up no sooner than 48 hours AFTER PURCHASE at the gazebo at the intersection of Hanging Rocks Rd & Sachuest Point Rd, as long as all the needed documentation is uploaded and approved.  This allows our team time to review and process your application.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Review Application
recordTypes.description: Application to the Zoning Board of Review for consideration of request for Special Use, Dimensional Variance, Modification Granted by Zoning Officer, and Extension Request.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Certificate (Zoning Compliance Letter)
recordTypes.description: A zoning certificate, also known as a zoning compliance certificate or zoning certificate of occupancy, is a legal document that confirms a property complies with current zoning regulations and can be used for its intended purpose. It ensures that a property's use aligns with local zoning laws, which are designed to protect the public from potential nuisances or hazards.

recordTypes.name: Complaints and Observations
recordTypes.description: Select to make any complaints or observations about anything in the Town of Middletown.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building permit from the Town of Middletown, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Victualling and Additional Operating Hours
recordTypes.description: Apply for a license for Victualling House License and Additional Operating Hours from the Town of Middletown.

recordTypes.name: NEW Life Safety Inspection
recordTypes.description: Click here to submit your request for an inspection from the Office of the State Fire Marshal (related to business licenses or construction rough/final)

recordTypes.name: Middletown Non-Resident: Beach Seasonal Parking Pass Application
recordTypes.description: Passes purchased online will be available for pick up no sooner than 48 hours AFTER PURCHASE. You can pick passes up at the gazebo located at the intersection of Hanging Rocks Rd & Sachuest Point Rd.  This period of time allows our team time to review and process your application

recordTypes.name: Closing Sales Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for a closing sales permit from the Town of Middletown.  Must apply 14 days prior to the start of the sale.  The license is valid for 60 days and may be extended for 30 additional days.

recordTypes.description: Apply for a plumbing permit from the Town of Middletown, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Tent  Permit
recordTypes.description: This application must be submitted at least seven days in advance of the event.  If you have an urgent request, please call us directly.

recordTypes.description: Apply for a Bingo License from the Town of Middletown.

recordTypes.name: Junk Yard

recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit from the Town of Middletown.

recordTypes.name: Moving Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a moving permit from the Town of Middletown.

recordTypes.name: Holiday Sales/Sunday Selling License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a license Sunday/Holiday Sales from the Town of Middletown. Sunday Sales applies to Class A Liquor License holders only, allowing the sale of liquor on Sundays. Holiday Sales License (RIGL 5-23-1) is for those business' selling retail items on legal holidays including New Year's Day, Memorial Day, Fourth of July, Victory Day, Labor Day, Columbus Day, Veteran's Day, Thanksgiving Day and/or Christmas or any other enumerated holiday officially celebrated.

recordTypes.name: Tattoo
recordTypes.description: Tattoo license from the Town of Middletown.

recordTypes.name: Amusement
recordTypes.description: Dance/Entertainment/Movie Theatre/DJ/Bands/Karaoke

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a sign permit from the Town of Middletown. All permit applications should include photos of any existing signage.

recordTypes.name: Special Event Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a  Special Event Permit  -  A SPECIAL EVENT within the meaning of this chapter is any event that requires the partial or full closure of a road or street or other public property, such as a section of a beach or park or public parking lot, or that the applicant or sponsor knows or should know by promotion, public announcements, or past experience.  To view the Special Event Ordinance in its entirety, within the Town Code, click select to proceed to the next page.

recordTypes.name: Fence Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a fence permit from the Town of Middletown, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Construction Site Runoff Control/ Storm Water Runoff and Water Quality
recordTypes.description: Construction Site Runoff Control Application to the Town of Middletown  for construction work on a property

recordTypes.name: Fortune Tellers License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Fortune Teller License from the Town of Middletown.

recordTypes.name: Collection Box Permit
recordTypes.description: This is an annual permit for placement of a Collection Box pursuant to Section 726 of the Town of Middletown Zoning Ordinance.  The permit year shall begin on July 1 in each year and shall terminate on June 30 of the following calendar year.  A collection box permit shall be renewed annually. The application for renewal must be filed not later than 30 days before the permit expires, otherwise a new permit application must be submitted. The application for renewal shall be upon a form provided by the Building Official.

recordTypes.name: Registration for Short Term Residential Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a short term rental registration from the Town of Middletown.  Permit December 1, 2025 - November 30, 2026.
